meanings.definition: To mark or make a note of something in writing.
meanings.sent1: She notates important information in her notebook.
meanings.sent2: The secretary notates the meeting minutes for future reference.
meanings.sent3: He notates his daily tasks to stay organized.
meanings.sent4: The teacher notates key points on the whiteboard for the students.
meanings.sent5: The detective notates clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: To record or write down musical notes.
meanings.sent1: The composer notates the melody on sheet music.
meanings.sent2: Musicians notate their compositions for others to play.
meanings.sent3: The conductor notates the tempo changes for the orchestra.
meanings.sent4: The music teacher notates the rhythm for the students to follow.
meanings.sent5: The pianist notates the dynamics to express emotion in the piece.

meanings.definition: To indicate or represent something in a written form.
meanings.sent1: The map notates the locations of important landmarks.
meanings.sent2: The diagram notates the different parts of the machine.
meanings.sent3: The chart notates the sales figures for the month.
meanings.sent4: The graph notates the trend of the stock market.
meanings.sent5: The recipe notates the ingredients and cooking instructions clearly.
